sqlMap.delete: delete from T_GENERALPROCESS_MISTAKE t where t.processmodelid_four=$processModelId$
sqlMap.select:
select t.mistakeid, t.flow_id, t.mistake_content, t.punish_bal, t.empid, t.taskname, t.processmodelid_four, t.add_time from T_GENERALPROCESS_MISTAKE t WHERE t.flow_id=#busId#
t.processmodelid_four != #processModelId:VARCHAR#

select t.mistakeid, t.flow_id, t.mistake_content, t.punish_bal, t.empid, t.taskname, t.processmodelid_four, t.add_time from T_GENERALPROCESS_MISTAKE t, T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELFOUR T1 WHERE t.processmodelid_four = t1.processmodelid and t.processmodelid_four=$processModelId$
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_GENERALPROCESS_MISTAKE.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into T_GENERALPROCESS_MISTAKE (MISTAKEID, FLOW_ID, MISTAKE_CONTENT, PUNISH_BAL,EMPID,TASKNAME,PROCESSMODELID_FOUR,ADD_TIME) values (#mistakeId:DECIMAL:-9999#,#flowId:VARCHAR#,#mistakeContent:VARCHAR#,#punishBal:VARCHAR#,#empid:VARCHAR#,#taskName:VARCHAR#,#processModelIdFour:VARCHAR#,#addTime:VARCHAR#)

SELECT SEQ_GENERALPROCESS_MISTAKE.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into T_GENERALPROCESS_MISTAKE (MISTAKEID, FLOW_ID, MISTAKE_CONTENT, PUNISH_BAL,EMPID,TASKNAME,PROCESSMODELID_FOUR,ADD_TIME) values (#mistakeId:DECIMAL:-9999#,#flowId:VARCHAR#,#mistakeContent:VARCHAR#,#punishBal:VARCHAR#,#empid:VARCHAR#,#taskName:VARCHAR#,#processModelIdFour:VARCHAR#,#addTime:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT T.PROCESSMODELID,T.FLOW_ID,T.OPNINION_CONTENT,T.TASKNAME,T.RECTIFICATION,T.DHHS,T.ZSCURRENCY,T.ZSMONEY, T.PROCESSMODELID as MISTAKETYPE FROM T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELFOUR T where T.PROCESSMODELID = #processModelId#
sqlMap.update: update T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELFOUR set OPNINION_CONTENT = #opninionContent:VARCHAR#, RECTIFICATION=#rectification:VARCHAR#, DHHS=#dhhs:VARCHAR#, ZSCURRENCY=#zscurrency:VARCHAR#, ZSMONEY=#zsmoney:VARCHAR# where PROCESSMODELID = #processModelId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELFOUR.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
insert into T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELFOUR (PROCESSMODELID, FLOW_ID, OPNINION_CONTENT, TASKNAME,RECTIFICATION,DHHS,ZSCURRENCY,ZSMONEY) values (#processModelId:DECIMAL:-9999#, #flowId:VARCHAR#, #opninionContent:VARCHAR#, #taskName:VARCHAR#,#rectification:VARCHAR#,#dhhs:VARCHAR#,#zscurrency:VARCHAR#,#zsmoney:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.PROCESSMODELID,T.FLOW_ID,T.OPNINION_CONTENT,T.TASKNAME,T.RECTIFICATION,T.DHHS,T.ZSCURRENCY,T.ZSMONEY FROM T_GENERALPROCESS_MODELFOUR T where 1=1
T.FLOW_ID = #flow_id:VARCHAR#
T.TASKNAME = #taskName:VARCHAR#
